short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Streamline your workflow with our Markdown export tool. Generate polished documents easily.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Markdown Exporter: Enhance Your Document Workflow

Markdown Exporter is a versatile Chrome extension that allows you to create, preview, and export high-quality Markdown documents directly in your browser.

Key Features:
  Preview and Edit:  Instantly toggle between editing and preview modes to see your changes in real time.
  Image Support:  Add and preview images seamlessly in your Markdown content.
  Import Options:  Easily import .md or .txt files for editing.
  Export Options:  Generate documents in various formats:
      PNG, JPEG, WebP:  Share Markdown as image files.
      PDF:  Preserve formatting with high-quality PDF exports.
      HTML:  Convert Markdown to HTML for web publishing.
      Markdown: Save your work for future editing.
  Diagrams and Math: Use Mermaid diagrams and MathJax to enhance your content visually and mathematically.

Markdown Exporter is your all-in-one solution for Markdown creation, editing, and exporting, helping you streamline your workflow and boost productivity.
